title: # 443 - Pat McGann & ME
description:
Today I sit down with comedian Pat McGann. We talk about going on the road with Sebastian, raising teenagers, Bobby Knight, what it was like to do Letterman, shooting his special, and much more!

 

Check out Pat’s standup special “When’s Mom Gonna Be Home?” on iTunes or Amazon Prime!

 

This episode is brought to you by Kamikoto. Get an extra $50 off site wide at http://www.kamikoto.com when you use the code “BERT” 

 

This episode is also brought to you by Fre. Get 20% off at http://www.frepouch.com when you use the promo code “FreBert”.

 

This episode is brought to you by Quip. Go to http://www.getquip.com/bertcast to get your first refill FREE.

 

This episode is also brought to you by Whoop. Go to http://www.Whoop.com and use the Code “Bertcast” at checkout to get your first month free. 

 

This episode is also brought to you by Liquid IV. Get 25% off when you go to http://www.liquidiv.com and use the code “Bert” at checkout. 

 

This episode is also brought to you by Harry’s. Redeem a Harry’s Trial Set at http://www.HARRYS.COM/BERT for just $3!

 

This episode is also brought to you by Fight Camp. Get free shipping and a gift valued up to $109 with every FightCamp package at http://www.joinfightcamp.com/bert  

 

For all TOUR DATE & MERCH click HERE: http://www.bertbertbert.com
